CustomAssetInfo: Custom glossary maps should be stored in this folder. They must be saved as PNG files, with a width-height ratio of 1.15:1 (e.g. 4000 x 3480 or 2000 x 1740 in size). Once placed here, they will become available to display in the campaign's glossary using the mapImage attribute! (E.G. mapImage="Custom/My Map Name").
